channel.title: Comments for page "Ultra Dessert"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Ultra Dessert"

item.title: Note
item.content:encoded: Flavor text is likely a reference to the Disgaea series, particularly Disgaea Infinite. The following is from the wikipedia article: "The game begins with the main character Prinny meeting up with Etna, Flonne, and Laharl. Laharl is looking for the Super Rare Pudding that he believes Etna is hiding. "

item.title: Heart of the Cards
item.content:encoded: Shouldn't it be mentioned in the page that this is one of the four Kaiju Drops required to unlock Heart Of The Cards content?
